name: Atlantix Global Systems
tagline: International Supplier of New and Used IT Hardware
description:
In business for more than 39 years, Atlantix is one of the largest resellers of enterprise-class equipment in the world. 
We sell and provide services internationally, doing business on every continent. Atlantix buys and sells to end users, re-sellers and broker to broker. We are different than a VAR or a manufacturing representative. 
At Atlantix, we focus on lowering your costs for IT equipment while staying committed to top quality and a green environment.
